TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LayoutAnimationController extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A layout animation controller is used to animate the children of a layout or a view group.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual float Delay { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Returns the delay by which the children's animation are offset. -or- Sets the delay, as a fraction of the animation duration, by which the children's animations are offset.
Docs.value: a fraction of the animation duration
